edu.mason.insf.ann
Class BaseNode

java.lang.Object
  edu.mason.insf.ann.BaseNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdalineNode, BaseNetwork, BPNode, InputNode
public class BaseNode
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents attributes that are common across all neural network architechtures. The BaseNode class manages the receiving of input values and the distribution of the processed information to other nodes in the network. THe BaseNode class does NOT define how the node objects process information; this task is left to the BaseNode progeny.
